summary: Daniel Radcliffe is 'sure' that the Harry Potter movies will be rebooted one day
title: Daniel Radcliffe is 'sure' that the Harry Potter movies will be rebooted one day
body:
Daniel Radcliffe reckons we’ve not seen the last of the boy wizard Harry Potter on the big screen.

The former child actor who bought Harry to life has said that he’s ‘sure’ that one the franchise will be rebooted one way or another.

He made the comments in an interview with IGN.

“I’m sure there will be some other version of it; I know I’m not the last Harry Potter I’m gonna see in my lifetime – we’ve already got a few more,” he said.

The ‘few more’ he’s likely referring to are the actors who have played Potter on stage, in the West End show Harry Potter and the Cursed Child – Jamie Parker and Gareth Reeves.

He went on: “It will be interesting to see how long those films stay… it feels like there’s a sacredness around them at the moment, but that’ll go, the shine will wear off at some point.

“It’ll be interesting if they reboot them and just do the films again or do a series; I’m fascinated to watch.”

The Potter franchise was a dazzling money spinner for Warner Bros.

Over eight movies, beginning in 2001 with Harry Potter and the Philosopher’s Stone and ending in 2011 with Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2, the studio made almost $8 billion (£6.2 billion) at the box office.

The final instalment alone brought in $1.3 billion (around £1 billion) alone, meanwhile the Harry Potter studio tour at Warner Bros’ Leavesden Studios made £337 million between opening its doors in 2012 and the end of 2017.

summary: Invasive Harry Potter Thought #1:
body:
Invasive Harry Potter Thought #1:

JK Rowling had been so set in pushing her agenda that Slytherins were bad people (either fitting in Enemy #1 like Draco Malfoy -love him-, Lucius Malfoy and Snape or Bodyguard type like Crabbe and Goyle)

But really, Crabbe and Goyle should have been filed under Hufflepuff as they were incredibly loyal to Draco, fought for him and it also would have fit better for the narrative. For the idea that not all bad people come from Slytherin, loyalty is loyalty but that doesn’t always mean clean loyalty - think Tommy Shelby or John Murphy - or “pure” loyalty and it would also defy that constant arch that people always say Slytherins are evil (though there are many examples of this) and shows children that loyalty can be just as dangerous as ambition.

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

summary: Daniel Radcliffe está "seguro" de que Harry Potter tendrá un reboot
title: Daniel Radcliffe está "seguro" de que Harry Potter tendrá un reboot
body:
Si la palabra del propio Harry Potter vale algo en lo que respecta al futuro de la saga, los Potterheads de todo el mundo podrían estar de enhorabuena. Y es que Daniel Radcliffe ha dicho estar seguro de que “alguna versión” del personaje volverá a las pantallas en un futuro indeterminado.

La saga ya ha sido trasladada a los escenarios de West End y Broadway, y ha engendrado la exitosa franquicia de spin-offs Animales fantásticos –que en principio abarcará cinco películas. ¡Pero queremos aún más Potter!

“Sé que no soy el último Harry Potter que veré en mi vida –ya tenemos algunos más”, contó el actor de 29 años a IGN, en referencia al montaje teatral Harry Potter y el legado maldito (Harry Potter and the Cursed Child), estrenado en 2016.

Desde que concluyeron los libros y las películas de la saga principal, los Potterheads anhelan regresar a las vidas de los Merodeadores –James Potter, Remus Lupin, Sirius Black y Peter Pettigrew. Un deseo que también compartiría el propio Radcliffe:

“Creo que hay otras historias de ese mundo que perfectamente podrían convertirse en una serie de televisión, sin duda”, contó a TV Guide.

“Una serie sobre la generación anterior, eso estaría genial”.

Por lo pronto, la próxima incursión en el universo Harry Potter será la tercera entrega de Animales fantásticos, cuyo estreno se espera para noviembre de 2020.

summary: May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their...
body:
May second, 1998 - years have past since the down fall of the Dark Lord and the wizarding community is still struggling in their efforts to move on from the terrors that war had caused. But a new generation is taking over; a generation who have known nothing but a time of peace. They have grown up hearing the stories of family and friends murdered by Death Eaters or relatives who will spend the rest of their lives in Azkaban, but they have never lived that life of fear, and they want to ensure they never make the mistakes of their elders.

A movement to eradicate blood supremacy has brought activists together from all over Europe, leaving them with a harsh and unforgiving debate on the best way to ensure equality for all, regardless of blood status. Some are joining politics, pushing for laws to set quotas for how many muggleborn and halfblood citizens must work in different careers and offices. Others want pureblooded witches and wizards out of society all together. The only thing that is certain is this is a time of change and no one is sure just yet if it is for better or worse.

COMING SOON | A LITERATE NEXT GENERATION ROLE PLAY CENTERED ON THE RISE OF MUGGLEBORN RIGHT ACTIVISM IN THE BRITISH WIZARDING COMMUNITY.

summary: Snow  Draco Malfoy x Reader
title: Snow  Draco Malfoy x Reader
body:
Warnings:Some smut, Fluff, Language

Ship:Draco Malfoy x Reader

Requested:Nope, I had to do one of these about my baby Draco, I think my baby Fred was getting to much attention

Wanting nothing more than some peace, you took a walk outside, exhaling with a loud sigh. You felt at peace when it snowed, it looked so angelic outside, you couldn’t help but leave, a perfect looking trail of footprints to Hagrid’s hut and beyond.

Everything was perfect, as your Slytherin robes, gladly hid any sign of you being out past curfew. Your cat pranced in the snow behind you, rolling and sprinting around.You giggle as your black fluffy cat, looked up at you with his gorgeous gold eyes.”How’s it going, Treasure.” You murmured to your cat, and he began to happily prance again.

“What are you doing out past curfew?” Asked an all to familiar voice, Draco Malfoy. You turned your head, as he looked around and rushed over to you, pulling on your arm.”Are you wanting to get bloody caught.” He hissed in your face and you raised a brow.”I never get caught, Malfoy.” You hissed back.

You and Draco, aren’t really buddy buddy, but he always seemed to appear everywhere you went, like he was following you. You started to brighten up at the idea of Draco following you, but you always pushed that feeling or what ever it was, to the back of your mind. You also started sitting with him at lunch, and hanging with him on your free time.

He snorted, looking you straight in the face.”Well then, why are you out in the middle of Hogwarts, in the most noticeable spot.” He lowly glowered at you, and you rolled your eyes.”I will do what I want, when I want, and where I wnat to do it, Malfoy and there’s nothing you can do.to.stop.me.” You snarled at him, that was until you heard Filch waddling down the pathway, straight to where you both were.

You pulled you hand from his and sprinted, running towards the Forbidden Forest, Draco followed you, as you both ducked behind a bush.”Who’s there.” Filch yelled, as you focused on him, as Draco did the same. Filch shook his head, taking one look around the area, before waddling away.

You let out a long sigh, and Draco looked at you.”You almost got caught there, (Y/N)!” Draco grumbled at you quietly, and you stuck out your tongue at him, which he grabbed with his pale and cold fingers.”Don’t stick your tongue out at me, ass.” He grimaced at you, not letting go of you tongue. You pulled at his hand, then bite his finger lightly.

“You fucking bit me!” He screeched quietly, and you giggled. He scrunched up his nose, in anger, and grabbed you by your wrist, pulling you closer to his face.”That wasn’t very nice.” He hissed, his gorgeous face becoming more soft.He shook his head and dropped your wrist, looking away from you.

You pierced your lips, and poked him in the side, and his face snapped to you, his cheeks tinted pink. You smirked, and he went to grab your finger, that was about to poke him again. You pulled back, and Draco lost his balance, falling on top of you. This time you both blushed, but you were pretty sure yours were rosy red. He tried to get up, but his robe was caught in a root, and he looked at you.

Suddenly,Draco fell on top of you, and you felt something hard abruptly poke you. You blushed wildly again, and his face went totally blank. He undid his robe and you scrambled on your feet, as he followed your actions.

“S-sorry.” He stammered and you were clearly still blushing but, you shrugged, piercing your lips.”Let’s just go.” You huffed, and turned on your feet. You practically ran into the common room, tripping up to the girls dorm and quietly sneaking into bed, Treasure waiting there for you.

You’ve been avoiding Draco for the past few weeks now, not really ready for that awkward talk between the two of you. You’ve skipped classes, hung out with Harry and his friends, pulled pranks to get detention,went to bed and woke up early, going to the Great Hall early and leaving early, losing him in the crowd, anything to avoid that awkward conversation with the boy you liked. But, this time, you couldn’t find a way to avoid him. You were walking down the hallway, to the Slytherin common with your cat, when you heard footsteps behind you.

You turned your head, and saw Draco, walking up to you.You turned back around ‘I don’t want to do this now’ you thought in your head, as you walked faster, he beginning to pick up the pace as well. Soon, he was chasing you, and you could see the way into the common room until-

you slipped, crashing on the ground. You groaned as you quickly got up and started sprinting towards the common room, you really didn’t want to have that conversation now. Since you fell though, Draco was able to catch up to you, and he grabbed your arm.”(Y/N).” He said gently, and dragged you to the nearest empty hallway. 

He opened a door to a storage room, gently pushing you inside, and closing the door behind him. You started to get nervous, tapping your foot and fingers, as you exhaled and inhaled, you hated awkward conversations, actually any conversation at all. You felt him grab your shoulders and turn you towards him.

“Why are you avoiding me?” He asked, and you blew up your cheeks, and crossing your arms across your chest. He looked hurt, and you had to look away, but couldn’t answer.”(Y/N)?” He spoke, louder than before, and you looked at him.”Who wouldn’t want to avoid you, Malfoy.” You hissed, and his eyes widened in shock, but his eyebrows soon furrowed up.

”Why would you say that, after all, before the after curfew incident, you hung around me a lot.” He hissed, looking into your eyes, and you scrunched up your nose.” What are you saying, Malfoy.”

“What I am saying is, don’t avoid me.” He spat looking away from you, crossing his arms, and spreading his legs open just a little. Your eyes widened in shock.”And why would you want me to not, avoid you, Malfoy.” You challenged, and he glared at you.

“Because I fancy you god dammit, and call  me Draco, not Malfoy!” He yelled, and his eyes widened at what he said, but he continued to hold his ground. Your face matched his, but soon you felt yourself having the desire to kiss him, to hold him, to memorize every inch of him. 

You gasped, and stumbled back in shock, what were you thinking, loving a Malfoy, a family that your family has a grudge against. You bit your lip, thinking about what your parents would do if they found out.  You looked up at Draco, and realized it didn’t matter, it was fucking Draco, a hot, misunderstood boy, who you secretly cared about, no matter how much you tried to hide it.

You jumped on him, making him bump into the wall.”Damn (Y/N)-” Draco started, but was cut short when your lips met his. He inhaled your scent, drowning himself in the feeling of you being attached to him. He groaned, and you smiled into the kiss, but pulled away to breath.

“(Y/N).” Draco growled and he flipped you over, hitting your back against the wall, making you let out a loud moan, sweet to Draco’s ears. He began to feel you, kissing you with greed, as you did the same. The kiss was sloppy and full of love, that you felt addicted to it, like you wouldn’t be able to stop.

You pulled away letting out a small breath, and smiled at Draco, who was giving you a wicked smile. You raised a brow, and he hungrily kissed you hard, teeth meeting teeth and lips. Your fingers ran threw his beautiful white hair, as his hands went lower, grabbing your ass.

You let out a squeak, and he smirked, as his lips went along your law line and down your neck and up again. You moaned,as you pulled his hair, getting a groan in return.”Oh, (Y/N).” Draco breathed, sneaking his hands up your shirt, grazing his hand over your boobs, as you moan a little louder.

“Shh, (Y/N), you don’t want to get caught do yah.” He quizzed, as his arm started to go lower.”No, that’s why I was going to the girls dorm to go to bed, like we should.” You answered, kissing his nose.

“Since when were you such a goody-two shoes.”He breathed, as he kissed your nose in return.

“I just want to go to bed.” You whined and he chuckled.”Can I ‘Slytherin’.” He laughed.

“That is so Ron.” 

“I’m being Sirius.”

“I’m going to Askaban you from Hogwarts, if you don’t stop.”

“I’ll just start a Blaise-ing fire to get your attention, if you do.”

“Krum on!”

“What can I say, I am a Keeper.”

“Your being riddikulis, your more like a Chaser in any relationship.”

“Almost Petrifying, right?”

“Yeah, your Harry-ness,is making you very petrifying.”

“Your being quite Moody, aren’t you?”

“Hermione times do I have to tell you, your being riddikulis.”

“I think your brain is Malfoy-nctioning.”

“No, I’m trying to make a Riddle, but your making it hard.”

“Well, at least we’re not being Hippogriffs.”

You couldn’t help yourself, you both burst out laughing at the ‘riddikulis’ puns you were making, causing you both to get caught by Filch, and have a weeks worth of detention for staying up past curfew. At least you got to spend more time with your new boyfriend, Draco Malfoy.

Sorry the puns were bad, lol, what can I say, I can’t take things very Siriusly, it’s getting rather riddikulis.

You turned your head, as he looked around and rushed over to you, pulling on your arm.”Are you wanting to get bloody caught.” He hissed in your face and you raised a brow.”I never get caught, Malfoy.” You hissed back.

You and Draco, aren’t really buddy buddy, but he always seemed to appear everywhere you went, like he was following you. You started to brighten up at the idea of Draco following you, but you always pushed that feeling or what ever it was, to the back of your mind. You also started sitting with him at lunch, and hanging with him on your free time.

He snorted, looking you straight in the face.”Well then, why are you out in the middle of Hogwarts, in the most noticeable spot.” He lowly glowered at you, and you rolled your eyes.”I will do what I want, when I want, and where I wnat to do it, Malfoy and there’s nothing you can do.to.stop.me.” You snarled at him, that was until you heard Filch waddling down the pathway, straight to where you both were.

You pulled you hand from his and sprinted, running towards the Forbidden Forest, Draco followed you, as you both ducked behind a bush.”Who’s there.” Filch yelled, as you focused on him, as Draco did the same. Filch shook his head, taking one look around the area, before waddling away.

You let out a long sigh, and Draco looked at you.”You almost got caught there, (Y/N)!” Draco grumbled at you quietly, and you stuck out your tongue at him, which he grabbed with his pale and cold fingers.”Don’t stick your tongue out at me, ass.” He grimaced at you, not letting go of you tongue. You pulled at his hand, then bite his finger lightly.

“You fucking bit me!” He screeched quietly, and you giggled. He scrunched up his nose, in anger, and grabbed you by your wrist, pulling you closer to his face.”That wasn’t very nice.” He hissed, his gorgeous face becoming more soft.He shook his head and dropped your wrist, looking away from you.

You pierced your lips, and poked him in the side, and his face snapped to you, his cheeks tinted pink. You smirked, and he went to grab your finger, that was about to poke him again. You pulled back, and Draco lost his balance, falling on top of you. This time you both blushed, but you were pretty sure yours were rosy red. He tried to get up, but his robe was caught in a root, and he looked at you.

Suddenly,Draco fell on top of you, and you felt something hard abruptly poke you. You blushed wildly again, and his face went totally blank. He undid his robe and you scrambled on your feet, as he followed your actions.

“S-sorry.” He stammered and you were clearly still blushing but, you shrugged, piercing your lips.”Let’s just go.” You huffed, and turned on your feet. You practically ran into the common room, tripping up to the girls dorm and quietly sneaking into bed, Treasure waiting there for you.

You’ve been avoiding Draco for the past few weeks now, not really ready for that awkward talk between the two of you. You’ve skipped classes, hung out with Harry and his friends, pulled pranks to get detention,went to bed and woke up early, going to the Great Hall early and leaving early, losing him in the crowd, anything to avoid that awkward conversation with the boy you liked. But, this time, you couldn’t find a way to avoid him. You were walking down the hallway, to the Slytherin common with your cat, when you heard footsteps behind you.

You turned your head, and saw Draco, walking up to you.You turned back around ‘I don’t want to do this now’ you thought in your head, as you walked faster, he beginning to pick up the pace as well. Soon, he was chasing you, and you could see the way into the common room until-

you slipped, crashing on the ground. You groaned as you quickly got up and started sprinting towards the common room, you really didn’t want to have that conversation now. Since you fell though, Draco was able to catch up to you, and he grabbed your arm.”(Y/N).” He said gently, and dragged you to the nearest empty hallway. 

He opened a door to a storage room, gently pushing you inside, and closing the door behind him. You started to get nervous, tapping your foot and fingers, as you exhaled and inhaled, you hated awkward conversations, actually any conversation at all. You felt him grab your shoulders and turn you towards him.

“Why are you avoiding me?” He asked, and you blew up your cheeks, and crossing your arms across your chest. He looked hurt, and you had to look away, but couldn’t answer.”(Y/N)?” He spoke, louder than before, and you looked at him.”Who wouldn’t want to avoid you, Malfoy.” You hissed, and his eyes widened in shock, but his eyebrows soon furrowed up.

”Why would you say that, after all, before the after curfew incident, you hung around me a lot.” He hissed, looking into your eyes, and you scrunched up your nose.” What are you saying, Malfoy.”

“What I am saying is, don’t avoid me.” He spat looking away from you, crossing his arms, and spreading his legs open just a little. Your eyes widened in shock.”And why would you want me to not, avoid you, Malfoy.” You challenged, and he glared at you.

“Because I fancy you god dammit, and call  me Draco, not Malfoy!” He yelled, and his eyes widened at what he said, but he continued to hold his ground. Your face matched his, but soon you felt yourself having the desire to kiss him, to hold him, to memorize every inch of him. 

You gasped, and stumbled back in shock, what were you thinking, loving a Malfoy, a family that your family has a grudge against. You bit your lip, thinking about what your parents would do if they found out.  You looked up at Draco, and realized it didn’t matter, it was fucking Draco, a hot, misunderstood boy, who you secretly cared about, no matter how much you tried to hide it.

You jumped on him, making him bump into the wall.”Damn (Y/N)-” Draco started, but was cut short when your lips met his. He inhaled your scent, drowning himself in the feeling of you being attached to him. He groaned, and you smiled into the kiss, but pulled away to breath.

“(Y/N).” Draco growled and he flipped you over, hitting your back against the wall, making you let out a loud moan, sweet to Draco’s ears. He began to feel you, kissing you with greed, as you did the same. The kiss was sloppy and full of love, that you felt addicted to it, like you wouldn’t be able to stop.

You pulled away letting out a small breath, and smiled at Draco, who was giving you a wicked smile. You raised a brow, and he hungrily kissed you hard, teeth meeting teeth and lips. Your fingers ran threw his beautiful white hair, as his hands went lower, grabbing your ass.

You let out a squeak, and he smirked, as his lips went along your law line and down your neck and up again. You moaned,as you pulled his hair, getting a groan in return.”Oh, (Y/N).” Draco breathed, sneaking his hands up your shirt, grazing his hand over your boobs, as you moan a little louder.

“Shh, (Y/N), you don’t want to get caught do yah.” He quizzed, as his arm started to go lower.”No, that’s why I was going to the girls dorm to go to bed, like we should.” You answered, kissing his nose.

“Since when were you such a goody-two shoes.”He breathed, as he kissed your nose in return.

“I just want to go to bed.” You whined and he chuckled.”Can I ‘Slytherin’.” He laughed.

“That is so Ron.” 

“I’m being Sirius.”

“I’m going to Askaban you from Hogwarts, if you don’t stop.”

“I’ll just start a Blaise-ing fire to get your attention, if you do.”

“Krum on!”

“What can I say, I am a Keeper.”

“Your being riddikulis, your more like a Chaser in any relationship.”

“Almost Petrifying, right?”

“Yeah, your Harry-ness,is making you very petrifying.”

“Your being quite Moody, aren’t you?”

“Hermione times do I have to tell you, your being riddikulis.”

“I think your brain is Malfoy-nctioning.”

“No, I’m trying to make a Riddle, but your making it hard.”

“Well, at least we’re not being Hippogriffs.”

You couldn’t help yourself, you both burst out laughing at the ‘riddikulis’ puns you were making, causing you both to get caught by Filch, and have a weeks worth of detention for staying up past curfew. At least you got to spend more time with your new boyfriend, Draco Malfoy.

Sorry the puns were bad, lol, what can I say, I can’t take things very Siriusly, it’s getting rather riddikulis.
